remarks: Property of being a pre-statement.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mpstval.v $e |- V = ( mDV ` T ) $.
mpstval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mpstval.p $e |- P = ( mPreSt ` T ) $.
elmpst $p |- ( <. D , H , A >. e. P <-> ( ( D C_ V /\ `' D = D ) /\ ( H C_ E /\ H e. Fin ) /\ A e. E ) ) $.
